remarks: The range of the function operation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Mar-2017.)
statement:
ofrn.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
ofrn.2 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> B ) $.
ofrn.3 $e |- ( ph -> .+ : ( B X. B ) --> C ) $.
ofrn.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofrn2 $p |- ( ph -> ran ( F oF .+ G ) C_ ( .+ " ( ran F X. ran G ) ) ) $.
